name: Break Beat VR
description:
Break Beat VR is a unique take on a VR Rhythm game, incorporating JRPG turn based mechanics alongside standard rhythm game features to allow you to vanquish foes by the power of your drums! Fight your way through each stage to reach of the end of the level and claim your title as Drum Lord!

Break Beat VR was developed for the Oculus Quest line of headsets, so other headset compatibility is not guaranteed.
